alternateName: 📌Comprehensive stats and attributes for all Clash Royale cards (2025 update)

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the 👑 Clash Royale Cards Data 👑🃏 dataset

distribution.name: clash_royale_cards.csv
distribution.description:
This dataset provides a detailed look at every card in Clash Royale, combining static attributes with dynamic performance metrics from current gameplay data.

Each card includes:

Basic info (ID, max level, elixir cost, rarity)

Performance data like win rate, usage rate, and their recent changes in the meta.

Perfect for analyzing trends, building data-driven decks, or training machine learning models around game balancing and player strategies.

field.name: id
field.description: Unique card ID used in the game's internal system

field.name: maxLevel
field.description: Max upgrade level for the card

field.name: elixirCost
field.description: Max upgrade level for the card

field.name: rarity
field.description: Card rarity (common, rare, epic, legendary, champion)

field.name: Win Rate Change
field.description: Change in win rate compared to previous season (%)

field.name: Usage
field.description: How often the card appears in decks (%)

field.name: Usage Change
field.description: Change in usage rate compared to previous season (%)
